title: Longest Consecutive Sequence
description: Given an unsorted array of integers nums, return the length of the longest consecutive elements sequence. You must write an algorithm that runs in O(n) time.
hints: Can you use a hash set to check for consecutive numbers in O(1) time?
How can you identify the start of a consecutive sequence?
If a number has a left neighbor (num-1), it's not the start of a sequence
Only count sequences starting from numbers with no left neighbor to avoid duplicate counting
real_world_applications: Finding continuous availability periods in monitoring
